name: Paddle Battle (itch)
description:
Paddle Battle

A Pong retro clone made in Unity 2017.  This game makes use of Unity's built in physics engine and rigid body dynamics.

Features
  • 2x Paddles for 2x Player Action
  • 1 Ball that keeps coming back
  • 10 Possible Points per player
  • It's a goddamn retro clone :P
